item.title: Deploying Hugo Blog to GitHub Pages
item.description:
Deploying Hugo Blog to GitHub Pages

This guide explains how to deploy your Hugo blog to GitHub Pages for free hosting.

Note: This is a placeholder for translation. The complete translation will be added later.

Setting Up Your GitHub Repository

Create a repository named yourusername.github.io to host your blog.

Configuring GitHub Actions

Use GitHub Actions to automate the build and deployment process of your Hugo site.

Custom Domain Configuration

Learn how to set up a custom domain for your GitHub Pages site.
